ch0023_00_momi/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I hope you’re faring well today.
ch0023_00_momi/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m feeling quite blissful today!
The happiness of my Pokémon
tends to rub off on me.
ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_01_10:
When you wander the land as I do,
you get the chance to chat with all
sorts of different Trainers.
ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_02_10:
Some want to be stronger—some want to gain
a closer friendship with their Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_03_10:
What they wish to achieve with their
Pokémon varies a lot depending on the person.
ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_04_10: But one thing they all share in common...
ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_05_10:
is the incredibly strong bond they have
with their Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi/0601_0702_01_10:
Blissey and I have traveled
far and wide together.
ch0023_00_momi/0601_0702_02_10:
After all this time, our sync strength
must be strong indeed.
ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_01_10:
When I’m out on a journey, if I ever
feel close to breaking down and giving up...
ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_02_10:
I think about you and my Pokémon
and I suddenly feel energized and
ready to press on again.
ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_03_10:
It’s good for Trainers to remember that
our Pokémon are always by our side.
ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_04_10:
Never forget that, all right?
The people around you are always
there to support you when you need it.
ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_01_10:
The Old Chateau was a really frightening
place, even with my Pokémon there beside me.
ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_02_10:
But you know, the only reason I am who I am
today is because my Pokémon was there for me.
ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_03_10:
Trusting and believing in your Pokémon
is so, so important.
ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_01_10:
My Blissey’s egg makes everyone smile,
no matter who they are!
ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_02_10:
Sometimes she even lets me hold it.
Feeling its soft warmth in my arms
really puts me at ease.
ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_03_10:
It feels like holding a little ball
of happiness!
ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_04_10:
If you’re ever feeling worn out, you should
try borrowing Blissey’s Egg as well.
I’m sure it’ll make you feel much better.
ch0023_00_momi/0603_0702_01_10:
Did you know that my Blissey can
immediately spot when I’m feeling down?
ch0023_00_momi/0603_0702_02_10:
She has such a kind heart. Just having her by
my side makes me feel 100 percent better.
ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_01_10:
Sometimes it’s good to loaf around and relax
with your Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_02_10:
You never know—you might discover a
new side of your Pokémon that it doesn’t
show during battles.
ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_03_10:
For example, if Blissey cuddles me when
we’re taking a nap, I sleep like a baby!
ch0023_00_momi/0604_0702_01_10: Pokémon are all so fluffy and cute, but...
ch0023_00_momi/0604_0702_02_10:
it would take some courage to take
a nap with a Wailord.
ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_01_10: I usually do all of my hair styling myself...
ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_02_10:
but sometimes Blissey really wants
to do it for me.
ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_03_10:
The results aren’t always the most polished,
but I let her do it anyway because she
looks so cute when she’s excited!
ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_01_10:
I have really long hair, but it’s much easier
to deal with when it’s braided like this.
ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_02_10:
Funnily enough, Pokémon are attracted to my
braid as it sways while I’m walking.
It makes them want to pounce!
ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_03_10:
Does it make you want to
pounce, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0023_00_momi/1701_0701_01_10:
I had a dream that I was riding on a Pelipper
on an adventure through the clouds...
ch0023_00_momi/1701_0701_02_10:
and when I woke up, I was holding
this in my hand.
ch0023_00_momi/1701_0702_01_10:
Isn’t that odd? I suppose stranger things
have happened.
ch0023_00_momi/1701_0702_02_10:
Maybe I’ll find something even nicer in my hand
the next time I wake up from a nap! Tee-hee!
ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve been having so much fun recently.
ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_02_10:
I mean, relaxing and taking naps with my
Pokémon is great and all, but...
ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_03_10:
going out and exploring with you recently
has been such a delight!
ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_04_10:
Adjusting our strategies to match our opponents,
battling side by side...
It’s all just so exciting!
ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_05_10:
I find myself thinking about our next
adventure all the time now!
ch0023_00_momi/2501_0702_01_10:
There are some opponents I would be a
little worried about battling by myself...
ch0023_00_momi/2501_0702_02_10:
but if we challenge them together, I feel
confident that things will work out somehow!
ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon aren’t just cute—they pack a
lot of punch as well! Tee-hee!
ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_02_10:
I have a friend who’s an incredibly
talented Pokémon Trainer.
ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_03_10:
Meeting that friend is actually what helped
me realize how much I enjoy Pokémon battling!
ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_04_10:
Even now...I’m just itching to go out there
and find someone to battle with!
ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_01_10:
I’d love to make more friends who enjoy
Pokémon battling like I do.
ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_02_10:
I mean...it would be nice if
we could be friends.
ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_03_10: Or rivals! Rivals are great, too!
ch0023_00_momi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
I hope this is a happy day for you!
ch0023_00_momi/3002_0701_01_10:
That scent in the air when you wake up early
in the morning is the scent of adventure!
ch0023_00_momi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello there. Why don’t you take a few deep
breaths with me and enjoy a slow day?
ch0023_00_momi/3004_0701_01_10:
This is the time of day when my Pokémon
and I have the most energy!
ch0023_00_momi/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening!
I think it’s almost bedtime.
ch0023_00_momi/3006_0701_01_10:
I know you’re working very hard,
but if you stay up too late,
you or your Pokémon could fall ill.
